oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tokyo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Japan; politics; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several people, possibly protesters, sit inside a tent covered with signs and photographs. One sign in English, which reads: "Nonsense Of The Cen[...] -- Trial of Korean Patriots By -- Ex-Junior Officer Serving Jap. Emporer"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brown, Saul
